text: Red Indian children who never go to school
the Kaffirs in Africa , whose dear papas
houses like very big bee - hives
the brown people in the island of New Caledonia , where a boy is never allowed to speak to or even look at his own sisters
a people not fond of soap and water , and very much given to art magic
The King who would be Stronger than Fate , â€™ but was not so clever as his daughter
children , who like the same sort of thing
